item.title: The potential marketing opportunities presented by a customizable wearable device
item.description:
Source: Broadcast Wear website. Control the shirt’s display with an app. Broadcast Wear, an innovative company from Hyderabad, has introduced a programmable t-shirt with touch-sensitive technology, opening up exciting possibilities for marketing. Their invention incorporates a flexible, washable LED screen directly into the fabric. Users can pair the shirt with the Broadcast Wear smartphone app to instantly show any text or image. A simple tap turns the screen on and another tap switches it off...
